name: Dookie Dookie Literature Club
description: "Dookie Dookie Literature Club" follows the adventures of a man composed of feces on a journey of self-discovery. The player is offered a multitude of choices on this journey, which guides the main character down drastically different paths, choosing either the path of vengeance, as he tracks down the plumbers that murdered his father, the path of forgiveness, or the path of adventure. "Dookie Dookie Literature Club" offers a multitude of endings based on the choices the player makes. Ultimately, "Dookie Dookie Literature Club" is a tale of vengeance and forgiveness. A  tale of choices, of adventure, of discovery.
